section.name: Installation
section.title: Installation
section.p: Loom runs on a variety of platforms that have installed the Java 2 Virtual Machine.

Everything required to run Loom and develop Loom based products comes with the distribution. If you wish to help develop Loom then it is recomended that you obtain the full source tree from CVS or from the nightly builds.

section.name: Compiling
section.title: Compiling
section.p: Execute the relevant platform specific script (build.[sh|bat]) in the base phoenix directory.
Executing this script will create a dist directory within the Loom directory. The dist directory will contain the compiled class files packaged into jars.
